title: Denso - global revenue 2008 to 2019
yAxis: Net sales in million Japanese yen
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales in million Japanese yen for 12 number of Fiscal years.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen of Fiscal year 2010 is 1.8% smaller than the maximum value at 2019.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales in million Japanese yen for 12 number of Fiscal years.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net sales in million Japanese yen for 12 number of Fiscal years.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen of Fiscal year 2010 is 1.8% smaller than the maximum value at 2019.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal year in the x axis and Net sales in million Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
The second highest Net sales in million Japanese yen is appeared to be the Fiscal year 2018.
The difference of Net sales in million Japanese yen between the highest and lowest Fiscal year is 2386063.0.
The Fiscal year 2019 has the highest Net sales in million Japanese yen, followed by 2018, and 2017. Down to the Fiscal year 2010 which is the lowest.
The Fiscal year 2010 has 1.34 times less Net sales in million Japanese yen than average.
Summing up the values of all Fiscal years, we get total 47938943.0.
